attributes.action: Hold a By-Election in Hallam Constituency
attributes.background: Hallam has essentially not had an M.P. for 6 weeks since Jared O’Mara closed his office. As he is unable to do the job we should have the opportunity to elect someone who will represent the area in parliament.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be sacked or fired.

The resignation of an MP would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.
